title: Match History bug

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: There is 4 match history of someone named ''Eclipse NR8'' on my match history personal page... and all my own game are gone, what is happening right now ?

replies.body: It looks like some players might be seeing games not belonging to them when selecting match history in the client.  We're looking into this, but for now please feel free to use the external [match history site](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/).

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dM8EALjL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-03T18:30:09.291+0000)
>
> It looks like some players might be seeing games not belonging to them when selecting match history in the client.  We're looking into this, but for now please feel free to use the external [match history site](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/).

Thanks for answer. Let's say i was Ã  bit surprised as i dont own any of the champion played in the 4 game shown.
Don't worry everyone is having it riot should notice it soon. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Interesting...I'm just now hearing about this.  Will look into this, thanks for the heads up!

That's a really strange issue, so I took a look into this.  I searched your profile through the client, and didn't see anything out of the ordinary here.  Your match history looks exactly like it should to me, and each game showing accurately.  

Also, this match in your screenshot dated way back in February.  o_o  When you have some time, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can help find out what's going on.  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as we can!
